description: A lot of members loved Jay's photo shoot where he worked his way through a range of interesting and varied toys! Jay is a cheeky chap, nice toned body, and a naughty edge where he can be persuaded into most things! We try and shock him by hiding some phallic toys under the pillow, but he seems to know what is expected! After showing us his lean body he jumps onto the bed and prepares to experiment! Some of the dildos are easier going for Jay than others, but he relaxes into it well, and soon has both hands busy - one pumping his hole with a toy, the other jerking himself off. He seems determined to try every shape and size we have going - before busting his load over his abs. Thanks for pushing your boundaries again on camera, Jay!
title: Bonus Video of Jay's Photo Shoot - Str8 Jay Taking a Master Class in Dildos!
